titleStmt.title: A right godly and Christian A.B.C. shewing the duty of every degree To the tune of Rogero.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A11715 of text S115591 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 22). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
